name: Evie
coverLetter:
Hi! I hope this msg finds u well. To not take up much of your time I'll get straight to the point. 


My partner and I are traveling from SoCal to NorCal trimming. 


-we have our own supplies 

-we are willing to travel

-we can provide our own food/ help cook

-we provide high quality trim

-we are willing to work long hrs


If in the LA area, we don't need housing. If it's outside LA like Sacramento or Humboldt we would only need access to kitchen & shower since we have a mobil bedding.


We understand every farm is different. 

We are respectful, professional , and friendly. We are looking for a safe space to do what we love best. Trim!! 


Our asking rate is: $125-200 per lb.

Scale depends on product quality and whether the farm provides food/shelter. Our trim rate is 2-3lbs/8hrs. We are knowledgeable in both indoor & outdoor, wet & dry trims, and we also can help with harvesting. 


We are ready to start ASAP


Thanks for your time! 


-D&E 


(Recommendations provided upon request)
